columns.name: DeviceId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the device in the service

columns.name: DeviceName
columns.description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the device

columns.name: OSPlatform
columns.description: Platform of the operating system running on the device. Indicates specific operating systems, including variations within the same family, such as Windows 11, Windows 10, and Windows 7.

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the record was generated

columns.name: ConfigurationId
columns.description: Unique identifier for a specific configuration

columns.name: ConfigurationCategory
columns.description: Category or grouping to which the configuration belongs: Application, OS, Network, Accounts, Security controls

columns.name: ConfigurationSubcategory
columns.description: Subcategory or subgrouping to which the configuration belongs. In many cases,  string describes specific capabilities or features.

columns.name: ConfigurationImpact
columns.description: Rated impact of the configuration to the overall configuration score (1-10)

columns.name: IsCompliant
columns.description: Indicates whether the configuration or policy is properly configured* A value of 1 is Compliant* A value of 0 is Not Compliant

columns.name: IsApplicable
columns.description: Indicates whether the configuration or policy applies to the device* A value of 1 is Applicable* A value of 0 is Not Applicable

columns.name: Context
columns.description: Additional contextual information about the configuration or policy

columns.name: IsExpectedUserImpact
columns.description: Indicates whether there will be user impact if the configuration or policy is applied
